solution.text:
Asexual reproduction does not require a long time for growth and maturity
They are more likely to have defects because they are born from a single parent
New plants produced by asexual reproduction contain genes from 1 parent only
They are less likely to evolve because they are exact copies of a single parent

content.text: Which of the following is a characteristic of asexual reproduction?

incorrect.text: New plants are less likely to have defects
New plants contain genes of two parents
New plants are more likely to evolve

correct.text: New plants take less time to grow and mature
